price: – i sve što vam je na Zemlji šaroliko stvorio – u tome je, doista, znak ljudima koji se prisjećaju i pouku uzimaju.
arabic: وَمَا ذَرَأَ لَكُمۡ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ مُخۡتَلِفًا أَلۡوَٰنُهُۥٓۚ إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَأٓيَةٗ لِّقَوۡمٖ يَذَّكَّرُونَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wamā dhara-a lakum fī al-arḍi mukh'talifan alwānuhu inna fī dhālika laāyatan liqawmin yadhakkarūna
